Updates.php?eid=564.linkTitle:
Webinar - Conscious Leadership for Sustainability2024-04-30 to 2024-04-30An online webinar on the topic “Conscious Leadership
for Sustainability” was organized on 30 th April 2024
with CS Deepak Jain, founder of Vijayash Foundation
and Chairperson of DMA ESG, Deepak J & Associates,
as the expert speaker. CS Deepak Jain shared his
valuable experience and knowledge among
participants on various key ESG topics including
Environment Sustainability and Climate Crisis,
Responsible Consumption, Energy Conservation,
Minimalism and Simplicity, Community Engagement.
In addition, the expert speaker also discussed the
measures of Climate Change; Renewable Energy
Resources such as Green Hydrogen, Solar Energy,
Wind Energy etc.FileDepartment of MGMT
